name: Artisan 5 Page
summary: Learn about .ARTPAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Artisan allows you to customize pages of a scrapbook, photo book, or wall calendar with photos, text, shapes, and other elements and export them to be preserved digitally or printed and combined with other pages into a scrapbook, calendar, etc. You can save entire projects as ARTPROJ files with version 5 of Artisan or A6PROJ files with version 6 of Artisan. Additionally, you can save individual pages as ARTPAGE files with version 5 or A6PAGE files with version 6.
NOTE: Artisan was formerly known as Storybook Creator and developed by Creative Memories. However, FOREVER acquired Storybook Creator and re-branded it as Artisan.

instructions: You can open ARTPAGE files with FOREVER Artisan (Windows). For example, you can open an ARTPAGE file with version 5 and 6 of Artisan by selecting File â†’ Open. However, version 6 of Artisan may not display the pages correctly.

Since ARTPAGE files are Zip archives, you can rename the .artpage file extension as .zip, then extract its contents with a Zip-compression utility. For example, Microsoft File Explorer in Windows and Apple Archive Utility in macOS can extract files from the renamed ARTPAGE file.
FOREVER Artisan can convert ARTPAGE files to various file types, including the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
